entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING
..TORNADO WATCH 314 IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING

entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, HEAVY RAINFALL, AND TORNADOES, THEN SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE THIS MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, BECOMING WEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
